projects.title: Myntra Clone
projects.description: A fully responsive clone of the Myntra shopping platform, built using React and styled-components. It includes product listings, filtering, cart functionality, and user authentication.

projects.title: Dell Homepage
projects.description: A front-end replica of the Dell India homepage using React. The project mimics the look and feel of the original site and showcases modern web design elements and responsive layouts.

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: A React-based Task Management app with features like task creation, status updates, and deletions. Useful for tracking personal or team tasks, with a clean and intuitive UI.
